name: Middle Ground - The Midway Adventure
description:
• Middle Ground •

Middle Ground is an addicting and fun jumping game that you wont be able to stop playing.
Continue to cross obstacles and score more points, let the super fun begin !

• FEATURES •

- Multiple different characters to choose from
- Vehicles raging from a simple taxi to a truck transporting material for construction
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
- Addicting gameplay
- Fun themes
- The way you move around is very important
- Try to outrun the ghost before he bites you
- Steer the duck and his friends to create your dynasty
- Watch out for incoming traffic, watch out for backroads
- Fast cars are coming from both sides and on every lane

FREE JUMPING fun is just a tap away. Download Middle Ground today!
